Name: Armory
Description:
Contains weapon and armor upgrades for Factory and Starport units.

Enables:
- Hellbat at the Factory
- Thor at the Factory

Root.Tooltip: Upgrades the damage dealt by ground vehicles.
Root.Name: Upgrade Vehicle Weapons Level 1

Root.Name: Upgrade Vehicle Weapons Level 2
